section.name: Course Introduction
section.summary:
Welcome to Project-Based Science Instruction for Career Preparation!

There are three units in this course:

Unit 1: Using Project-Based Learning to Connect Science Instruction to Daily Life

  • Overview of Project-Based Learning (PBL)
  • Characteristics of PBL
  • PBL for Science Instruction

Unit 2: Using Project-Based Learning to Prepare Adults for STEM Careers

  • STEM Occupations
  • Scientific Practices in STEM Occupations

Unit 3: Mapping Science Education to Career Paths

  • PBL in STEM Areas for ABE
  • Science Education for Career Pathways
  • PBL Topic Selection

Before we explore these topics, let's take a moment to reflect on some of the best practices we are already using in our classroom.
